svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Adjusted net savings are equal to net national savings plus education expenditure and minus energy depletion,
mineral depletion, net forest depletion, and carbon dioxide.
